periodic_table.description_ru: Determining the position of an element in the periodic table: period, group, subgroup. Metals and nonmetals. Atomic number and its relation to atomic structure.

electron_config.description_ru: Writing electron configuration of atoms, understanding subshells, Klechkovsky's rule, Hund's rule. Exceptions (Cr, Cu and others).

periodic_trends.description_ru: Patterns in element properties across periods and groups: radius, electronegativity, ionization energy, metallic character. Explained through electronic structure.

oxidation_states.description_ru: Determining oxidation states of elements in compounds. Relationship with electron configuration and position in the table. Oxidizer and reducer.

bond_type.description_ru: Covalent (polar and nonpolar), ionic, metallic bonds. Determining bond type by electronegativity difference and substance composition.

crystal_structure_type.description_ru: Ionic, molecular, atomic, and metallic lattices. Relationship of lattice type with physical properties (melting point, solubility, conductivity).

classification.description_ru: Oxides (basic, acidic, amphoteric), acids, bases, salts. Determining class by composition and properties.

naming.description_ru: Systematic and trivial names of substances. Name from formula and formula from name.

amphoterism_logic.description_ru: Amphoteric oxides and hydroxides: reactions with acids and alkalis. Typical amphoteric elements (Al, Zn, Be, Cr).

reactions_exchange.description_ru: Exchange reactions in solutions: neutralization, salt + acid, salt + alkali, salt + salt. Full and net ionic equations.

gas_precipitate_logic.description_ru: Driving forces of ion exchange reactions: formation of precipitate, gas, or water. Solubility table. Carbonate + acid → CO₂.

reactions_redox.description_ru: Substitution, balancing redox reactions using electron balance method. Activity series of metals. Metal + salt, metal + acid.

genetic_chain_logic.description_ru: Genetic relationship between substance classes: transformation chains metal → oxide → hydroxide → salt, etc.

qualitative_analysis_logic.description_ru: Identifying substances by characteristic reactions: precipitate color, gas evolution, indicator color change.

reaction_energy_profile.description_ru: Factors affecting reaction rate (temperature, concentration, catalyst, surface area). Activation energy. Chemical equilibrium.

catalyst_role_understanding.description_ru: Role of a catalyst: what it changes (rate, Ea) and what it doesn't (product composition, heat effect, equilibrium). Exo- and endothermic reactions.

calculations_basic.description_ru: Molar mass (Mr), amount of substance (n = m/M), mass fraction of an element. Calculations from substance formula.

calculations_solutions.description_ru: Mass fraction of dissolved substance (ω). Problems on preparing, diluting, and mixing solutions.

reaction_yield_logic.description_ru: Calculating product yield. Practical and theoretical yield. Excess and limiting reagent.

electrolyte_logic.description_ru: Electrolytes and non-electrolytes. Strong and weak electrolytes. Electrolytic dissociation of acids, bases, and salts.
